input_text:
Job Title: Sous Chef Unique Venue! Hiring Quickly!

Location: Roslyn, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
To Apply for this Job Click Here

We have an amazing opportunity for a Sous Chef with a unique and well-respected restaurant group!

This group offers an extremely competitive salary, business stability and most importantly a FUN environment!

Hiring Quickly!

Don't miss out!

Send your resume and change your future today!

Sous Chef Benefits Include

Extremely competitive base salaryBonus programVacation time

Sous Chef Responsibilities Include

Creating a welcoming environment for employees and guests!Coaching, development, and hiring of the kitchen staff while also developing your personal skills for future growth!Adhering to all food safety/quality assurance standards!Working in tandem with the Executive Chef to accomplish location goals!Encouraging a fun culture and having fun!

Sous Chef Qualifications Include

4+ years of experience as a Sous Chef or relative position!Ability to communicate and build teams across the entire establishment!Prior experience with a creative and extensive menu is a plus!Speaking Spanish is a big plus

Hiring quickly!

Change your future and submit your resume today!

At Goodwin Recruiting we are committed to our core values. We take our value, Dedicated to Diversity & Inclusion, very seriously and will never discriminate against a candidate or client based on any protected classes. Our clients seek qualified candidates, and that is what we deliver. A person's age, gender, race, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status, or arrest or conviction record has no bearing on whether he, she, or they are able to do the job. We evaluate the knowledge, skills, and abilities that meet the requirements of the position and aim to open doors and change lives. We value all people, understanding that uniqueness and diversity foster a stronger team that is innovative and brings varying perspectives to the table. We put our money where our mouth is and are proud of our efforts to identify a broad slate of candidates, with many hiring success stories to share. JOB ID: 134897 #post

Anthony Leone

To Apply for this Job Click Here

, $70,000 - $75,000,

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Adhering to food safety/quality assurance standards
Working with the Executive Chef to achieve location goals
